name: Messagestogod
tagline: A text message app allow you to send a message to god.
body:
#Welcome to the MessagestoGod wiki!

##Text to God

My uncle's idea. Using the text box the person would be able to create a text and send it to God however it would just reside on their phone system.  


###Questions:

Would I need to create a fake person in contacts called God?

Would I need to be able to intercept text messages to this one person and log them into a file on the phone for later retrieval?  


###Extras:

Make it so they can customize the name of their God.

Make it so they can send pictures of what they want.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
